Social And Cultural Activities: Chairman of many committee of institutions & colleges on behalf of these colleges approaching the Government to provide financial and curriculam related aid and promote social justice
Special Interests: Upliftment of the mankind; promote implementation of schemes of Central/State Government`s to the grassroot level
Other Information: Ex-Mahamantri of Jila Congress commitee, Bulandshahr,and also worked as active member of Youth Congress in U.P; during the tenure of MLC i.e. 1988 to 2009, almost 11 years he has participated as an active member of reputed Samities/Committies of Uttar Pradesh Vidhan Parishad and in May, 2008 he joined the Bahujan Samaj Party
